results.title: Effect of alpha-tocopherol and simvastatin on male fertility in hypercholesterolemic rats.
results.text_hl: Concomitant administration of @CHEMICAL_alpha_Tocopherol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D024502 @@@alpha-tocopherol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to @DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ markedly increased fertility index and sperm motility and viability associated with a significant reduction of @<m>DISEASE_Deafness_Cataract_Retinitis_Pigmentosa_And_Sperm_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C567467 @@@sperm cell abnormalities@@@.

citations.NLM: Shalaby MA, el-Zorba HY, Kamel GM. Effect of alpha-tocopherol and simvastatin on male fertility in hypercholesterolemic rats. Pharmacol Res. 2004 Aug;50(2):137-42. PMID: 15177301
